name: The Intelligence Agency
startIntroPart1: This Agency has well trained spies at you command, use them to gather intel and sabotage the enemy
startIntroPart2: Can The Intelligence Agency stand the test of time? Use your agents to know everything about the enmy and lead your civilization to victory!
declaringWar: Good Luck, our directors decided it is an optimal decision to ANNIHILATE YOU
attacked: Our agents warned us already, we were ready before you even de decided to attack
defeated: I guess our agents could only go so far to help us, may you use our remains to achieve victory!
introduction: We already know who you are, but decided to introduce ourselves.
afterPeace: Finally, our agents were able to bribe your leaders into stopping this idiotic war.
tradeRequest: Our spies said the you would probably accept this trade offer
unique: [+20]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
